com.tomzhu.tree

Class Treap<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>,P extends java.lang.Comparable<P>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomzhu.tree.Treap<K,P>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of element
    P - the priority element

    public class Treap<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>,P extends java.lang.Comparable<P>>
extends java.lang.Object
    a simple Treap structure implementation.

    1.7
    Author:
    tomzhu
